name: Bulk indexing of monitoring data on closed indices should throw an export exception

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.1.0-7fadeeb7c9b168db3a2a99f4ca3e4c7db41e8044 "[xpack.monitoring.collection.enabled] setting was deprecated in Elasticsearch and will be removed in a future release. See the deprecation documentation for the next major version."
